name: OPERATION TEMPLE
description:
You have to take on the role of a mercenary going on a dangerous mission, you are sent to an abandoned city to restore magical totems and destroy enemy invaders. On your way you will be threatened by dangerous enemies, monsters and traps, bravely overcome the greetings on your way and achieve your desired goal.

The game is a classic 2D platformer with action elements. Destroy enemies in the location, restore totems and complete assigned tasks.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various enemies
- Good soundtrack
